title: Shift AS to grow output without inflation

content.question: Given the aggregate demand and aggregate supply curves shown above, if policy makers want to increase real output without causing inflation, they can pursue a policy that will

choices.label: increase aggregate demand and decrease aggregate supply by equal amounts

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
